title: Dial “B” for Burger
description: One of the earliest films from prolific amateur filmmaker, Katie Mitchell. What do we really know about our food?
quote: I’m alive now! Even though I’m a hamburger.
altHero: a felt burger puppet with googly eyes and top hat
alt1: a girl eating a fast food burger
alt2: the burger in the wrapper has googly eyes
alt3: Monchi the pug grabs the burger with his mouth
